name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the Main Branch!! for GitHub

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attention please, this is the Main Branch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is designed to visually highlight when a user is on the main branch of a repository on GitHub. It dynamically alters the styling of the GitHub page to make the main branch more noticeable, helping to prevent accidental commits to the main branch from a browser.
